level.heading: TRANSPORTATION CONFORMITY – PROCEDURES FOR DETERMINING REGIONALRANSPORTATION-RELATED EMISSIONS (§ 20-1508)

level.text: Written commitments to control measures that are not included in the transportation plan and TIP must be obtained prior to a conformity determination and such commitments must be fulfilled.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 527 (January 8, 2010), incorporating text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 3132, 3142 (April 24, 2009).
